column8: 6RRq69w1orAAG: MACC will submit SRC probe within a monthPublished on May 14, 2017The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) is expected to conclude its investigation into SRC International's RM42 million, which went to Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak's personal bank account, within a month.This is according to attorney-general Mohamed Apandi Ali, in response to reporters at the 17th Asean Senior Law Officials Meeting (Aslom) in Putrajaya.
no need to wait I already know the answer. PM is innocent the money is from donation so no wrong doing. case close
